content.detailedDescription: It didn't seem to be anything flying it was just lights in the sky like chess pieces and different shapes flashing very quickly. i was out on my deck about midnight or two am. i looked up to the right and saw the best description i can give is chess pieces but they where bright and big for being so far away. they flashed repeatedly over and over. i can't imagine no one else seeing them. they where more than chess pieces they where just symbols they flashed so quick it was hard to tell what they where but they stayed up there for about five ten minutes. it seemed like a long time. i don't tell to many people this because it makes no sense to me either. i was in new haven missouri right outside of washington mo. it was a nice night i was up late and saw the lights they where hugh for being so far away. they just flashed different symbols and then stopped. sorry thats all i can tell you it's not a ufo but its the weirdest thing i ever saw i can't explain they where high in the sky like the stars but not that far away just big about four feet in height from the sky. i thought what the hell was that about. there's no military bases that way or a spot light or nothing like that it was to distinct and clear and they flashed quickly and dissappeared. this was back in 1997.
content.shape: Chevron,  Circle,  Cross,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: A bright light in the sky like chess pieces

content.detailedDescription: 5.05  am looking to the east low on the horizen. bright lights ,  one then a space and 6or 7 lights flashing.Left to right.  staying in the same place.  a lot brighter than any star.    cloudy night, no stars out.  moon was low. there was a little light from thr moon.
content.summary: To the east low on the horizen.  one light then a space and 6 or 7 lights in a row

content.detailedDescription:
Hi ,   
well one day i went to the dump, to take pics of the bears.  this was on my photos  . the very last pic is cropped and magnyfied.
about 4 months before this at around 6pm, i was lookin out my kitchen window and a huge ball of brillant light came down speeding toward the north.
the disk on these photos is comeing from the north. there are 3 hydro electric dams very close by .
i didnt hear it comeing or see  it.
unfortunately my camera is only 2.0 mega pixels 
the first 2 pics are the orginals and  the last i tryed to get a close up of.
let me know if u receive these pics, thank you! 
k.Kilborne
content.summary: Never seen , or heard it

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i saw something unusual in the night sky, this was not natural by any means it happened very quickly but i saw enough to know that i am convinced now that we are not alone, i have always read about aliens and ufo's but i always was sort of skeptical about the whole deal however i have now become a believer.

this thing i saw in the sky looked like a star a very big star about the size of a small car it and it had a silver glow about it appeared triangular with small silvery circles around it, it is really hard to try and expain what i saw because even i cant explain it to myself, but it was hovering for about a few minutes then it looked as though it lowered a bit then back up and vanished.

at the time i was sitting on my sofa watching a mvoie and i was sitting sideways infront of my apartments 3rd floor balcony but for some reason i tured my head at that exact moment and it was as if i was in a trance but i know it was not a trance it was shock or something like that, because i could not believe what i was seeing, when i finally could recollect myself i yelled, what was that? my fiancee who was sitting a little ways from the balcony watching the movie also looked at me in wonder as to why i was shouting at 12:15 am, knowing we had neighboors.

i told him what i saw and that i was sorry for the neighboors for yelling out but that i had never seen anything like that in my life and i admit i was a bit afraid at the time, still am a little afraid but i know i need to share my encounter with as many people as possible, i will defenitly never forget what i saw last night.
content.summary: Very big giant star like object

content.detailedDescription: 2:30 am a small white orb passed by my window. looked out of the window.In the west could see light fliyng in rappid movements. watched for 15 min.
content.summary: Small bright orb passed by window

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:00 am as i just lay down in bed with my wife, who just returned from working the night shift as a nurse.  i had the feeling i was being watched.  then i saw a disc-shaped white color ufo approaching me overhead at an angle down towards me. i was still fully awake but my wife was tired and had her eyes closed. the object was flat on the bottom with a domed top and had a light or lights around the dome with black areas between the lights that reminded me of windows. the object was only 12" in width and 12" high.  as i noticed it, it faded away and dissapeared. the entire sighting lasted only three seconds, but it was long enough for me to get a good look at it.  
i should note that i saw two chevron/triangular-shaped black ufo's in this same room at night on previous occassions within the past year. both of those objects moved through a closet towards the chimney and my wife saw these, too. there is also a lot of paranormal activity in the house which may or may not be related to these objects.
content.summary: Small ufo sighted inside house

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw a ovni i had 13 years old and lived in brasil- sao paulo, was in front my grandmother home, me and my friend saw by the window, a big yellow oval and stayed stopped in the air, hidden behind a building , appears again and simply disappeard!! was really huge!It was 1967, me and my friend were talking and listening music, sitting on the bed.It was probably 4 pm.

than i moved to santos beach -brasil-and saw once more- with many people in the beach-who stopped theirs cars to watch.It stopped over a little island in front of the  beach, i was with my ex husband and my too young children.It was full of colourful lights blimping and oval too-was 1982  -i repeat many people saw at that time, was unbeliveable.My ex husband wanted to go with children to watch the beach at night , and we went driving his car , with was probably 8 or 9 pm

than another time in brazil last year-2007, my husband now, was visiting me , and suddenly i went to watch by the window and was a circle object , blimping and moving, stay there more than 10 minutes, over some homes farway my apartment, it was 9 or 9:30, my husband saw too but despite the object was moving and blipping, he told was a light from some antena!!!!

now i marryed on december 2007 , and live here for 5 months and i saw many times again, here in south lyon, coming back to port huron 3 weeks ago , while we were in the car, was a huge light , circle and i saw for more than 10 minutes.It was 6:00pm-i didnt tell my husband and didnt show for him too.

but the lasting days i waked up always 3am , like something was telling me to go to watch the window bathroom and there was one again, is a strong light , circle and making many circle movements  up and down for more than 10 minutes  and another one like a fireball and simply disappears.Yesterday 1st april, happened again  the same  -at the window bathroom and i watch  then by the sunroom  window and saw a very dark image -isnt making any noise- was very scary, but didnt waked up my husband , and for my surprise this morning i saw our heater- we put woods inside to warm the patio, was opened- it is made by iron  and heavy -we didnt listening any noise but was openned!!! in this morning my husband didnt believe, but the heater was open- what is amazed because it has a format of tradiditional ufos- oval -really llok like a small ufo.
im scary really and dont have any normal explanation about that.
content.shape: Blimp,  Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Diamond,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Triangle
content.summary: I felt like someone was guiding me to  watch the sunroom window and there" it" was again!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I thought i come forward with what i saw that night in august 30,2003 at approx...11:15pm i live on a street that u could see the monterey park hill near monterey pass road..That night i had a smoke, like i do all the time on my front porch..And as i looked towards the hills of monterey park i saw a red spinning object with what appears to be black windows rotating in a circle about 30 rpms covered with  red hot glow from this object i can see it is black and of a saucer shape from my point of view it was very close about 3000 feet in front of me and this object was hovering over a house on the hill and it was very close to that house about 300 feet above it, it made no noise..And it was there for about 8 minutes the red hot glow would go out then come back on and when it did go out, i saw a saucer shape craft it was blacker than the night sky. i saw it very clear and it was dripping what seems like molten metal..Still spinning slowly just hovering there...After reading the article on this site about the red object over monterey park i know i had the most clear visual of this alien space craft..I never believed in these things but since that night i got more questions than answers...This object was huge about 300 to 400 feet across bigger than a 747 airplane. it hovered over the hill where most of the commercial airplanes fly over..It made me believe that we are being watched...Sorry it took me 5 years to tell my story,i had too do some research and watching all those youtube ufos and stuff. i think i had the clearest view of them all...And it was a scary site cause it was so close...And not knowing what this thing might do..This thing is burned into my mind,remembered it like if it where just yesterday..It has been awhile and i haven't seen anything like it since..I didn't take any photos cause i was shocked and my jaws dropped  i couldn't take my eyes off this thing..
content.summary: Hot metal object(red)with black like windows rotating very slowly in a circle

content.detailedDescription: Claims of first contact by air force officer last name hoffman. part of reverse engineering group with unit patch i did not recognize. it was unit crest with diagonal pattern on field with three four pointed stars. hoffman had clearance.  photo of him wearing russian colonal headgear with two pilots if front of plane before it flew to japan. if this strikes a note then you know how to reach me. if not then..
content.summary: Security breach while protecting vip

content.detailedDescription: It came to the center of the orchard stopped then it moved forwards and backwards then it continioued from one side of the orchard to the other side.Then it went over the top of the hill it was gone for about seven min. then it came back and did the same thing.
content.summary: Watched it for 15 min off & on moving forward backward & side to side.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside the chevron gas station i saw what looked to be a flare of some sort....It shot through the sky, red and orange in color. was very fast as it darted across the sky and just disappeared. happened so quick but was so weird, there was no noise at all.
content.summary: Short quiet flash

content.detailedDescription:
on 4/1/08 at 05:30 i saw three objects with very intense bright white strobes over  homer glen illinois. i was getting on toll way i-355 north, from west bound route 6 in new lenox. i noticed the strobes while on the ramp and watched them for the next several miles (minutes) as i headed north on i-355. the objects were northwest from the toll way and about 15 to 20 degrees above the horizon. the weather was dry but overcast, i have no idea what the ceiling was at the time. 
  the three objects appeared to be identical in the fact that all three had the same varying intensity, and frequency of the strobe effect, but the objects were not in sync with each other. since they were identical in brightness and appearance i assume they were of the same size and distance from me. there was also many strobes on each object with some slightly more intense than others, making each object look like a continuous varying strobe. there were no other lights, no red or green or landing lights, no steady lights of any kind, just very white intense strobes. i could not see any discernable shape of an object or objects, or tell how many strobes there were per object since the strobes on each object were very close to each other. my best description is each object was like a cluster of tightly packed, very intense strobe lights. 
  the objects also appeared to interact with each other, meaning as one moved another would follow. this dance went on for a minute or two. then while two of them were more or less stationary the third one headed away then quickly, amazingly quick, turned around and passed right between the other two and came to an abrupt stop shortly after passing them, making all three the same distance apart. shortly after that maneuver the three objects got in a straight line with one another (north to south), were equidistant to each other, and appeared to be heading south (remember i���m heading north at 65+ mph)  and then climbed away slowly at a 45 degree angle. at this point they were now due west of me. i never did see them enter the cloud deck or if they changed direction due to my vantage point while driving, and a strong desire to stay on the road. as they were climbing away the distance between them slowly increased but they were always equidistant to each other, as if in formation, and their appearance and strobe intensity although fading, remained constant between them.
  i am an aircraft technician and i am very familiar with various, not all, aircraft and helicopter lighting. i see airplanes almost everyday and night, going into and out of chicago���s midway and  o���hare airports, and several smaller airports, as i travel over 100 miles roundtrip every day (or night) to and from work. i am very familiar with the traffic and holding patterns too. in fact i did see airplane traffic in their usual routes, north and east of my location (for the given wind direction at that time). these objects were not in that vicinity, they were alone. i am also aware that there was a hotel fire in lockport illinois, to the south and west from were i witnessed these objects, and the local news teams did have their helicopters up covering it, but these objects were nowhere near that location. 
  i have never seen helicopters with so many intense strobes. i have never seen helicopters or any other aircraft accelerate and decelerate in such a short distance(?) and time. and, i have never seen them ���play��� with each other for a lack of a better description, and depart in single file and climb at a 45 degree angle. i am not saying it couldn���t have been 3 identical aircraft or 3 identical helicopters playing cat and mouse in the pre-dawn hours, all i���m saying is i have never witnessed anything like it in my 30 plus years in aviation.
content.summary: on 4/1/08 at 05:30 i saw three objects with very intense bright white strobes over  homer glen illinois.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the fall of 1996 or 97 near the buffalo airport.  i was working at tj max near transit and main.  it was 9-9:30pm and i was on my way home from work.  as i was driving i saw an orange ball in the sky at about a 45 degree angle.  this object seemed to move toward me as i passed the airpoirt runway.  it moved left to right and then came in front of my car.  it was shaped like a yellow pencil eraser.  it looked as though it had two sections. i pulled over and watched as it turned on its side (now it is almost overhead) and then fire poured from it.  it was like liquid fire which turned into ash.  i got out of my car and pretended i had a car problem to take a better look but the object disappeared and the ash was still falling.
content.summary: Saw orange ball in sky near buffalo niagara international  airport around 9pm.  it increased in size and was floating.

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were out goofing off.  local coffee shop sambo's was open 24 hours.  they went in and i elected to stay outside in the car.  i was reading the bible for the first time in my life.(revelation) i looked up in the sky in the distance and what appeared to be a star i noticed kept getting brighter. i kind of started talking to it and the light kept getting closer. the closer it got i could make out 3 red blinking lights in the shape of a triangle.  this was really freaking me out but i really enjoyed this kind of wierdness.  anyway long story short when it came very close i sat my butt in the car window and looked over the car.  they slowly moved and gradually were almost over my head when i realized that the pulsating red lights were not on one unit but three because they were not in sync perfectly.  they made not a sound. i could see the units were silvery metalic and cigar shaped or bullet shaped like a blimp. they came immediately over my head.  two gents drove into the parking lot and got out of their truck and i screamed at them to look at what i was witnessing. it was as if they did not hear me.  however, my friends (about 6 or 7) finally exited the restaurant and i told them to look up and they all saw it too.
i thought it was going to take me away so i started telling it to go away.
when my friends all came outside it did start going away slowly.  i was scared shitless because i had called it to me.  

i am not crazy but i have held that inside for many many years.  you can take this information or leave it.  i know what i saw and nothing will ever convince me otherwise.  

hell yes they are out there.
content.summary: Metallic cigar shaped with only one blinking red light on bottom center

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon,  

i have a number of ufo encounters,looking for a surgeon who believes in ufo abductions to investigate two scars of unknown origin,he should be in ct.-----privacy is extremely important!!!! i am well read about these matters---jacques vallee,hynek,hopkins,strieber,etc.---i am certainly a believer in alien abduction but i understand it is a subject of ridicule and government snooping.  contact me via usps mail and we can set up an appt. to meet.

            david zeno
             40 broad street,apt.1206
             middletown,ct.06457
content.summary: Tell later

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard this morning trying to get a few sky pictures. it was very cloudy with only a few brakes in the clouds. i thought i saw something but could not be sure. i captured this picture of a round ring and have no idea what it might be. it was pretty far up in the sky just under the clouds.
content.summary: Distinct black ring in cloudy sky

content.detailedDescription: I was 9 yrs. old living in san juan, puerto rico with my family, due to my father's job. my mother, two brothers and myself were at the drive-in movies, parked in our vehicle toward the right rear of the lot. we and i'm sure most of the drive-in attendees noticed a solid silver-like titanium (not chrome)disc shaped ufo aprox. 500-600 feet across. it could have been larger. it had a briliance all it's own and it was a clear night with no moon. it was also silent. rotating above, between us and the big movie screen. it was more to the right of the screen. as it hovered, it also rotated. the disc had a raised portion on the top and the bottom. but it was one solid object. slowly rotating you could see 3 different lights on the bottom. as it rotated, you could only see one light at a time due to the distance or the angle of the bottom portion. we viewed the ufo for aprox. 20-30 seconds until it decided to leave. when it took off, it moved faster than anything i know moves to this day and still no noise at all. as it flashed across the sky to the left we could no longer see it due to the landscape. on our way home, the radio announcer mentioned ufo sightings that were seen by many that evening in the san juan area. my older brother called the radio station and spoke with the announcer. he told him what we saw and he said he would get back to us. the air force said it was a helicopter with a neon sign on it. being only 9 years old, i know exactly what i saw and that was no helicopter. years later, still to this day, we discuss what we saw. once you see one, you know we are not alone. it gives you a whole new perspective on life and the universe. when i'm outside day or night, i'm always looking up. it was a wonderful and enlightening experience.
content.summary: 1964 ufo sighting at drive-in/san juan, pr

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was taking pictures of their new land they had just bought in canton, tx.  first picture is of her boyfriend removing the "for sale" sign. you can see the small black dot in the upper right corner of the picture.

second picture is of him after tossing the "for sale" sign on the ground. here you can see the object very well. she did not notice the object in either picture until the film was developed.

she didn't know what to do with the pictures until i told her they should be seen by someone just in case it is something.
content.summary: Did not see the image until after the film was developed.

content.detailedDescription: While driving rte 201 s through flatwoods pa appox 9 30 pm march 31st a huge brillant ball of white light appeared out of knowhere falling to earth seen for no more than 2 seconds just dissappeared somewhere over chalkhill pa
content.summary: Huge ball brillant white light appeared out of knowhere falling to earth then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I have taken very many photos of "orbs", strange "lights", and "vapors" in my backyard for a long time.  it is my belief that this activity has some type of spiritual, or extraterrestial connection to me.

these events occur whether it is raining or dry outside.
content.shape: Disc,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: I have taken photos of "orbs", "mists", and ufos  in my backyard at night.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were driving along a country road when we saw amber colored lights in a v shape flying just above the tree tops.  there was no sound.  we pulled over to the side of the raod to get a better look and the lights seemed to morph into a passenger plane.  the object became a matte silver color.And disappeared
content.summary: I was driving in a car with friends when i saw 5 or 6 amber colored lights shaped in a v formation.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i (i was seven at the time) were walking down the street around 1:30pm on a summer day.  it was clear and sunny.  my sister saw this object coming from the east above the interstate route 190 and drew it to my attention.  it was about 6 blocks away and at first i thought it was a jet until i realized it made no noise.  my sister and i started run home because we were frightened.  it followed us gliding along the tree tops and then veered off towards the grand island bridge southeast.  it was a silver color.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was 7 years when i saw a disc shaped object flying towards me and it was spinning and wobbling.

content.detailedDescription:
My father, my friend and i, went to a field to play, after about 10 minutes into playing basball, i noticed an object looking like a wierd shape, i said, "look", to them and they looked up and they saw the object. my dad said it looked cigar shaped, and it hovered for a few minutes blending in and out of the clouds, and then vanished. 

it was strange to see something we could not think of an explanation for just that it was an ufo.
this happened in 1984.

i can only attach a sketch i made.
content.summary: Floating in the clouds as if to blend in or made them, then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dog for a walk down my driveway approximately 10:30 p.M. when i heard what i thought was a jet engine overhead. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a large plane of some kind with 5 or 6 red lights that would flash in unison. i couldn't see the outline of the plane, just the lights. the lights were in the shape of a check mark. at first i thought it was a b-2 bomber and then i thought it was too big for a b-2. then i thought maybe a squadron of planes but the lights blinked in unison? it went from north to south in a straight line at a fairly slow speed. it probably took 3 or 4 minutes to travel out of sight. afterwards i thought maybe a lighter than air ship, blimp of some kind. i got the feeling that it was one of ours. didn't feel like i had seen something extraterrestrial.
content.summary: 5 or 6 red lights and loud hum of engines

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch looking at the stars because it was a very clear night. when i seen this particular bright white orb moving from west to east. i thought it was a plane at first because of it slow speed, until i noticed it was following a smaller white orb barely visible. i ran inside to get my 8mm camcorder, and filmed it just over my house. i am currently trying to figure out how to get it off 8mm and on too my computer so i can submit it. upon review of the tape, towards the end of the film the smaller craft, takes off at a right angle and disappears. i did not see this with my bare eyes. then something else shoots from left to right of the screen next from the bigger bright orb. i could not identify what it was. i stopped filming when i went to move through my house to my back porch, so i turned off my camera cause i did not want to film the inside of my house. when i got to the back porch i lost track of it (big orb). there was no point to continue filming.
content.shape: Circle,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: A big orb chases smaller orb in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were sitting on a bench facing the se in a small park between the buildings in my neighbourhood, i was actually talking about ufos and chemtrails and such with a friend of mine, when i saw 2 bright warm white lights like the headlights on a car slowly flying towards us, i told my friend who turned around and we watched the lights slowly fly in a straight line passing just over us, but while passing we could see it was first 2 lights then another came into view making it a boomerang shape, then it turned a little more triangular and a small fourth light came in to view... then you could see a small coldwhite strobe on the rear blinking every couple of seconds... then when it was flying away more lights on the sides could be seen... i shone a my 125 green laser on the aft of it.. but no reaction or reflection, also there as no sound only in the beginning you could hear a distant jet like sound like before a jet is going to pass but when it flew over us not a sound could be heard we waited for the sound after it went away but none to be heard...

we wasnt very surprised actually since this has been a very strange weekend....

i had my 7x monocular with me and here is where im stuck...

my monocular wont let me see stars because its blurry... but trees and airplaines not to far away can be seen pretty sharp... but this was totally blurred no matter how far i tried to turn the focus...
just seems plausible that this may be the reason i didnt hear it maybe it was traveling fast and high.... but to the naked eye it seemed about 600 meters away maybe 900 meters high..'

either it was a silent airplane with black body and no colored strobes...
or it was a huge craft traveling really far up, im going with the latter...

anyway we went home and made a very very good song... 

oh by the way.. what do you think about this... was playing around with the calculator a few months ago, when i came across this...

2012/366*666=3661,18

2012 has 366 days in it and 3661.18 is the orbit zachariah sitchin said to be nibiru planet x, the annunaki homeworld...

kinda wierd hehehe peacilation in the nation

phoenix
content.summary: Triangular, l-shaped lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from my car to the entrance of my apt. and i happened to look to my left.Appearing to be banking out of a turn was a very large triangle shaped aircraft.It was black but stood out from the night time sky.They have an air show here every year and i know the size of aircrafts from the distance involved.It disappeared behind a condo building that is about twenty stories high.That building is about six blocks away and it went out of sight maybe three quarters up.Thing is there are casinos higher than the condo building for about thirty blocks so it had to be beyond them.Compared to objects in size from the air show that were probably at a closer distance the black triangle shaped craft was twenty to thirty times larger and probably more if as i suspect it was a couple of miles away.To be clear i saw it clear.It was triangle winged with what appeared like a conventional pilot type area forward.I didn't even tell anyone for a year now i have to reconcile its existance with known physics and philosophy and there is none.It just brings to mind that shakespeare quote something about us being sport to wanton gods as flies are to us.Something is out there and i saw it but it is beyond anything i can figure out.
content.summary: I saw a very large triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I just entered the bruckner expressway at 138th street headed north bound.  when a passenger in my car noticed something to th east of us flying low.  when i looked through the widshield the object was very dark with very dim white long lights along the bottom edge of the object.  it was about 150 feet over the highway. it was headed west moving about 15 mph. after about 30 seconds i couldnt see it anymore.
content.summary: Passed over bruckner expressway around 8:30 pm in the south bronx

content.detailedDescription: I just entered the bruckner expressway at 138th street headed north bound.  when a passenger in my car noticed something to th east of us flying low.  when i looked through the widshield the object was very dark with very dim white long lights along the bottom edge of the object.  it was about 150 feet over the highway. it was headed west moving about 15 mph. after about 30 seconds i couldnt see it anymore.
content.summary: Passed over expressway around 8:30 pm
